writing_guidelines.description: Information should be entered in HTML code, sentence case, paragraph form with no bullet points.
The description is key to Search Engine Optimization (SEO) because customers search in ways that match real-life uses and concerns.
No promotional text like free shipping or discounts, no special characters or hyperlinks to other retailers.
For SEO purposes, repeat the product name within the body of the description and ensure it is unique and truly useful for customers.
Do not fill with information that would be pointless to the buyer.
Write in a conversational tone to help customers make informed decisions.
Use related keywords within the short description effectively.
Keywords should describe what the item is, how it is used, what it looks and feels like, and its uniqueness.

summary: This page outlines the site description guidelines focused on writing effective short descriptions for apparel products, emphasizing the importance of SEO, uniqueness, conversational tone, and the avoidance of promotional content.
